title: The Google app itself is active and on the time? Same as Phone Idle?
content:
My Google app is on and active the entire time... it has the same battery stat as Phone Idle as you can see here.
https://i.imgur.com/Vk0crQU.png

Is this normal behavior? The phone is new and I have no basis for comparison. My other Android 10 phone does not exhibit this behavior and the Google app does not even register as a battery user. Thank you.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
